name: Lumen
short_desc: A private Lumina server for IDA Pro 7.2+ function signature storage.
author: naim94a
description: Lumen is a private Lumina server that can be used with IDA Pro 7.2+. It stores function signatures so you (and your team) can quickly identify functions that you found in the past using IDA's built-in Lumina features. Backed by PostgreSQL with experimental HTTP API.
